subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Coach Jim Boeheim was jeered when he was introduced on Friday, and then the second-seeded Orange fell to No. 7 North Carolina State, 66-63, in their first Atlantic Coast Conference tournament.
snippet: Coach Jim Boeheim was jeered when he was introduced on Friday, and then the second-seeded Orange fell to No. 7 North Carolina State, 66-63, in their first Atlantic Coast Conference tournament.
